content.title: Product Vision
content.content: We envisions a world where information is **trustworthy, transparent**, and **empowering** for all.
content.subContent1: Our **solution** will provide **cutting-edge technology for real-time fact-checking, content verification**, a collaborative approach to identifying and countering disinformation and forensic analysis to expose the sources of disinformation

content.content: By **challenging** those who produce **fake news** to manipulate public opinion, we aspire to safeguard the truth, protect democracy, and create a world where facts matter and deception fails.

content.title: Key Features
content.content: By addressing disinformation at its core, we seek to rebuild trust in the information age, strengthen democratic institutions, and create a safer, more enlightened digital world for generations to come. Our success will be measured by our contribution to informed, free, and just societies worldwide.

cardContents.content: Real-time disinformation detection and tracking
Transparent Algorithm Explanations
User-friendly platforms for fact-checking and source vertication
AI-driven solutions to identify fake news
By using machine learning and AI algorithms continue to adapt and improve system's accuracy over time
Collaboration with reputable news sources and experts to validate information
Browser Extensions and Mobile Apps.
APIs for Integration
Privacy and Data Protection

content.title: About Us
content.content: Fact Finders Pro is on a mission to combat disinformation and restore trust in the digital age. We believe that accurate information is the bedrock of a healthy society, and we are dedicated to building innovative solutions to address the disinformation challenges of our time.

content.title: Join Our Team
content.content: We are looking for passionate individuals who share our commitment to fighting disinformation and want to be part of a dynamic team making a difference. Join us in this crucial mission to restore trust in information and shape the future of our digital landscape.

cardContents.content: Be at the forefront of a critical global issue.
Work with a talented, dedicated team of experts in technology and disinformation.
Drive meaningful change and make a positive impact on society.
Contribute to innovative solutions that challenge the status quo.

content.title: Leadership Team
content.name: Mahenoor Yusuf (Founder & CEO)
content.intro: A visionary leader, tech entrepreneur, intellectual entrepenuer, Harvard Alum and champion for Social Impact.
content.content:
Mahenoor Yusuf, Founder and CEO, is an accomplished business leader and visionary tech and intellectual entrepreneur deeply committed to creating a meaningful impact on societies. With an education from Harvard Business School and a career spanning over a decade at industry leaders like Dell, she swiftly ascended the ranks in the tech world before dedicating herself to entrepreneurship and the mission of pioneering innovative technology solutions for addressing pressing social issues.

Mahenoor's passion is to drive positive change in communities and society. She thrives on innovation and creating a leading platform that empowers individuals, communities, and organizations with the tools needed to discern facts from disinformation. She believes in creating a more reliable, transparent, and connected digital landscape where every user can confidently navigate the sea of information without being misled or manipulated.

Mahenoor’s inspiring leadership, extensive executive background and ability to set clear directions empower both her and her teams to fuel a positive impact on our world. Under her visionary leadership, Fact Finders Pro is on the path to advancing AI-driven innovation, fostering a society where truth and trustworthiness of information are paramount.

content.title: Advisory Board Member
content.name: Niko Klansek
content.intro: Seasoned Investor & Mentor, Serial Entrepreneur, and Sports Enthusiast with a track record in successful startup exits and a passion for fostering global entrepreneurship.
content.content:
Niko Klansek is a seasoned investor, mentor, and serial entrepreneur with a rich tradition of entrepreneurship. From a young age, he cultivated a passion for business innovation, nurtured by a family heritage of entrepreneurial endeavors. Over the years, Niko has co-founded several successful startups, generating impressive results, including two lucrative exits. His keen eye for business opportunities has also led him to invest in a diverse array of startups and Decentralized Autonomous Organizations (DAOs), amplifying their success stories.

Before stepping into the entrepreneurial world, Niko was an accomplished basketball player, where he honed his competitive spirit by winning multiple national championships in Slovenia. He further applied his leadership skills as the president of a professional basketball club.

At present, Niko is a founding member of Kenmare DAO, an investment fund specializing in early-stage Web3 and blockchain projects. His entrepreneurial spirit extends into the formation of the BizMe organization, a global platform aimed at promoting entrepreneurship and empowering budding entrepreneurs across borders.

Beyond his professional pursuits, Niko is fueled by a love for sports, travel, art, and horticulture, particularly growing tropical plants from pit to fruit. His journey has taken him across continents; living, studying, and working in various cultural environments of the EU, USA, and Asia, each enriching his global perspective and influence.

content.title: Join Us in the Fight Against Disinformation!
content.content: At Fact Finders Pro, we're on a mission to tackle one of the most pressing challenges of our time: disinformation. In an era where the spread of false information threatens our democracy, public safety, and informed decision-making we’re developing a game-changing solution and we need your help.

cardContents.title: Why it Matters?
cardContents.content: Disinformation undermines trust in media, institutions, and even among individuals. It poses a grave threat to our society and the values we hold dear. But we believe there's a better way.

cardContents.title: Our Solution
cardContents.content: We're building an innovative disinformation app that leverages cutting-edge technology, artificial intelligence, and community engagement to detect and combat false information in real-time. Our platform will empower individuals, organizations, and communities to make well-informed decisions based on accurate, reliable, and unbiased information.

cardContents.title: How You Can Help:
cardContents.content: We're turning to crowdfunding to make our vision a reality. Your support will enable us to expedite development, enhance our app's features, and expand our reach to combat disinformation on a global scale. By backing our campaign, you're taking a stand against the erosion of trust in information.

cardContents.title: Join the Movement:
cardContents.content: We invite you to be part of a community committed to truth, accuracy, and accountability. Your contribution, no matter the size, can make a significant difference in the battle against disinformation. Together, we can restore trust in information and protect the values that matter most.

cardContents.title: Spread the Word:
cardContents.content: Even if you can't contribute financially, you can still help by spreading the word about our campaign. Share it with your friends, family, and on social media. Every share brings us one step closer to our goal.

cardContents.title: What You'll Get:
cardContents.content: As a supporter, you'll be among the first to access our app when it's launched. We also offer exciting rewards and perks for different support levels, including exclusive updates, early access, and more.

content.content: Join us in the fight against disinformation today. Together, we can make a real impact and create a more informed, educated, and resilient society.
content.subContent1: Thank you for your support!

content.title: Privacy Policy for FactsFindersPro
content.content:
Last Updated: Nov 8th, 2023

At FactsFindersPro, we take your privacy seriously and are committed to protecting your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and protect your personal data when you visit our website, FactsFindersPro.com, and use our services to identify fake news and its sources. By using our website and services, you agree to the terms outlined in this Privacy Policy. Please read this policy carefully and contact us if you have any questions.

1. Information We Collect

1.1. Personal Information

We may collect personal information that you provide voluntarily when using our website and services. This information may include, but is not limited to, your name, email address, and any other information you choose to share with us.

We use the personal information you provide to deliver our services, including identifying fake news and its sources.

1.2. Non-Personal Information

We may also collect non-personal information, such as your IP address, browser type, and operating system, as you interact with our website and services. This information is collected for analytical and statistical purposes and does not identify you personally.

2. How We Use Your Information

2.1. Providing Our Services

We use the personal information you provide to deliver our services, including identifying fake news and its sources.

2.2. Improving Our Services

We may analyze non-personal information to improve the functionality and user experience of our website and services. This may include enhancing our algorithms and models.

2.3. Communication

With your consent, we may send you newsletters, updates, and other informational content related to our services. You can opt out of receiving these communications at any time.

3. Disclosure of Your Information

3.1. Third-Party Service Providers

We may share your information with trusted third-party service providers who assist us in delivering our services, maintaining our website, or performing other essential functions. These providers are obligated to protect your information and use it only for the purposes we specify.

3.2. Legal Requirements

We may disclose your information if required by law or in response to a valid request by a government authority. We may also disclose your information to protect our rights, privacy, safety, or the rights, privacy, or safety of others.

4. Data Security

We take reasonable precautions to protect your personal information. However, no method of data transmission or storage is completely secure, and we cannot guarantee the security of your data. By using our website and services, you acknowledge the inherent risks associated with data transmission over the internet.

5. Your Choices

5.1. Access and Update

You have the right to access and update your personal information. If you would like to review or modify the information we hold about you, please contact us using the information provided below.

5.2. Opt-Out

You can opt out of receiving our promotional communications at any time by following the instructions provided in the email or contacting us directly.

6. Changes to this Privacy Policy

We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or for legal reasons. We will notify you of any significant changes through our website or other communication channels.

7. Contact Us

If you have questions, concerns, or requests related to your privacy or this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:

Please note that this Privacy Policy applies only to our website and services and does not cover any third-party websites or services you may access through links on our website. We recommend reviewing the privacy policies of these third parties for their terms and practices.
content.subContent1: Thank you for choosing FactsFindersPro. We are committed to protecting your privacy while helping you identify and combat fake news.
